scripts.build: yarn workspace @paparats/server build && yarn workspace @paparats/cli build
scripts.build:docker:multi: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -f packages/server/Dockerfile -t paparats-server:latest .
scripts.test: yarn workspace @paparats/server test && yarn workspace @paparats/cli test
scripts.typecheck: yarn workspace @paparats/server typecheck && yarn workspace @paparats/cli typecheck
scripts.check: yarn typecheck && yarn lint && yarn prettier:check
